name: Smartwool PhD Ski Light Elite Print Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Ski Light Elite Print Socks
description: These lightweight ski socks have strategic cushioned zones for comfort, but the rest of the sock is kept light, so they slide inside performance-fit boots. Artwork inspired by Iuna Tinta.4 Degree Elite Fit System combines two elastics for stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place.Indestructawool blend improves durability in high-wear areas.Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
